sub_fields.label: Information
sub_fields.message:
This block adds an anchor point to the page, which allows you to link to this point via a special URL. The value must not start with a number. Once saved, the value is converted to lowercase, special characters removed and all spaces are replaced with hyphens.

For example, if you entered "This is an anchor", you would then link to that point using the following format: https://example.com/about#this-is-an-anchor

Please note the inclusion of the # in the URL format – you do not need to save this in the value. You can see the value in position on the front-end – normal users will not see this.

sub_fields.label: Anchor text
sub_fields.name: anchor_text
sub_fields.placeholder: NB: Must not start with a number

sub_fields.label: Overlay content
sub_fields.name: overlay_content
sub_fields.instructions: If any content is entered here, the image(s) will have a gradient overlay applied and the text will appear centrally over the top

sub_fields.label: Width
sub_fields.name: width
sub_fields.instructions: NB: "Contained" will add top and bottom margins to the block to match content flow

sub_fields.label: Media URL
sub_fields.name: media_url
sub_fields.instructions: Simply paste in a media URL and it will be converted to an iframe embed

sub_fields.label: Section Header
sub_fields.name: section_header
sub_fields.instructions: Section header that will appear above the content.

sub_fields.label: Text Title
sub_fields.name: text_title
sub_fields.instructions: Title that will show above the text block

sub_fields.label: Button Text
sub_fields.name: button_text
sub_fields.instructions: Enter button label if you want a button to show.
